sentences.en: All roads led to the abyss.
sentences.cn: 条条道路都通向无底深渊.

sentences.en: Anyone who betrays his motherland shall inevitably fall into the abyss of eternal sin and shame.
sentences.cn: 一切出卖祖国的人都必将堕入永远被人唾骂的罪恶深渊.

sentences.en: He felt he was on the edge of an abyss; one false move and he was done for.
sentences.cn: 他觉得如临深渊，一步不慎便会永劫不复。

sentences.en: He is plunging into an abyss of despair.
How big is the abyss between what you think you are and what you actually are?
sentences.cn: 你对自己的认识和真实的你之间差别到底有多大？

sentences.en: I'll pull out your hearts and throw them into the abyss of the hell!
sentences.cn: 我会把你们的心挖出来,扔进地狱的深渊!

sentences.en: Inordinate seeking, only will make own - self sink into suffering abyss.
sentences.cn: 过度的追逐, 只有自陷于痛苦的深渊.

sentences.en: Language itself breaks down before the final abyss.
sentences.cn: 面临最后的深渊,语言本身也枯竭了.

sentences.en: One slip on this mountain and you will fall into the abyss.
sentences.cn: 在这座山上一失足便会跌入万丈深渊.

sentences.en: Our indifference is that of one abyss overlaying another.
sentences.cn: 我们的冷漠像深渊重叠深渊.

sentences.en: The common people are plunged into an abyss of misery.
The immediate contingency overtook him, pulled him back from the edge of the theoretical abyss.
sentences.cn: 当务之急追上了他, 把他从理论深渊的边缘拉了回来.

sentences.en: The people are plunged into an abyss of misery.
The torrent, swollen by the melting snow, plunges into a tremendous abyss.
sentences.cn: 因融化的雪水而高涨的急流泻入一个巨大的深渊之中。

sentences.en: Without him, Angleton became a ship without anchor, drifting slowly toward the abyss.
sentences.cn: 失去了他, 安格尔顿成了无锚之船, 慢慢地向着旋涡漂去.

words.tran_cn: 深渊的，深海的；深不可测的

trans.tran_cn: 深渊，无底洞，深邃，<古>地狱，阴间，浑沌
trans.tran_en: a deep empty hole in the ground
